title: First patient enrolls in clinical trial for Wandercraft Atalante X exoskeleton
description:
Wandercraft's Atalante X robotic exoskeleton, which is already in use in rehabilitation centers worldwide, is being tested for ICU use.

The post First patient enrolls in clinical trial for Wandercraft Atalante X exoskeleton appeared first on The Robot Report.
